title: Emmanuel Kwasi Afranie
text: Emmanuel Kwasi Afranie (24 December 1943 – 9 November 2016) was a Ghanaian <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach who managed <a href="Accra%20Hearts%20of%20Oak%20S.C.">Hearts of Oak</a>, <a href="Asante%20Kotoko%20S.C.">Asante Kotoko</a> and <a href="Ghana%20national%20football%20team">the national team</a>.
